column2: (noun) the fact of an event happening, an invetion being made, or a person arriving
(adj) having or expressing more than one possible meaning, sometines intentionally
(noun) a feeling or idea that is suggested by a particular word although it need not to be a part of the wordâ€™s meaning, or something suggested by an object or situation
(verb) to discover the meaning of something written badly or in a difficult or hidden way
(adj) unable to read and write // knowing a little or nothing about a particular subject
(adj) (of a person) very inteliggent and skilful, or (of a thing) skilfully made or planned and involving new ideas and methods
(noun) words that are wirtten or cut in something
(adj) using special signs to represent the different sounds made by the voice in speech
